format: JavaScript (Jest setup for React app with Create React App)
description: This file sets up global testing configurations for a React project using Jest and testing-library. It extends Jest with custom matchers, mocks window.location to prevent navigation during tests, and initializes localStorage with default authentication data to facilitate testing of protected routes.

methods.name: Object.defineProperty
methods.description: Overrides window.location with a mocked version to prevent actual navigation during tests.
